Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem:
I received my product today and immediately unpacked it, only to regretfully find that the phone's screen shows numerous scratches. The rest of the phone looks perfect, I didn't even turn it on because the scratches bothered me too much.

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue, and we do not have sufficient stock for an exchange. We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards,
